title: Understanding the Pythagorean Theorem
topic_summary: A fundamental mathematical theorem that establishes the relationship between the sides of a right triangle, stating that the square of the hypotenuse equals the sum of the squares of the other two sides.
target_audience: Students learning geometry, mathematics enthusiasts, and anyone interested in basic mathematical concepts

scenes.title: Introduction to the Pythagorean Theorem
scenes.narration_summary: Hook the audience with the theorem's statement and its importance in mathematics

scenes.title: Understanding Right Triangles
scenes.narration_summary: Define right triangles and explain the terms hypotenuse, adjacent, and opposite sides

scenes.title: Visual Proof of the Theorem
scenes.narration_summary: Demonstrate a geometric proof by showing how squares on the sides fit together

scenes.title: Real-World Applications
scenes.narration_summary: Show practical uses in distance calculation, architecture, and navigation

scenes.title: Recap and Summary
scenes.narration_summary: Summarize the theorem, its proof, and key applications
